about.title: About me
about.p1: My name is Lisandro Funes, I am a web developer and Information Systems Engineering university student.
about.p2: My interest in development began when I discovered how to change the appearance of web pages through the developer options included in browsers. It was something totally new for me, and I found it interesting to learn how to develop websites myself.
about.p3: I started with tutorials and online courses to train myself and put what I learned into practice. I also started studying Information Systems Engineering, where I learned about object-oriented programming, Unified Modeling Language (UML) and the application of development patterns. I also learned about network and communication technologies, databases, operating systems, and computer architecture.
about.p4: I enjoy developing new projects to provide solutions and continue to learn new skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular, TypeScript, and BootStrap.

card_0.description: Web page developed for a technical service, dedicated to the repair and maintenance of computers.

card_1.description: Calculator to perform basic operations, with the possibility of switching between light mode and dark mode.

card_2.description: Application that allows you to generate and scan qr codes, with the option to download and share the generated codes.
